title: Tahm kench has 280 base damage, 70% slow on a 4 second cooldown.
body: How the fuck is that even fair? Tahm kench auto wins every melee matchup just by spamming q on cooldown because of how overstat it is. Dodge it? Doesn't matter it's up again before you could get a 2nd cs. Try to fight him? He just auto you 3 times, eat you, and throw you far away and you taking % max hp damage. So if you are against this guy in top lane, you are 100% reliant on your team because you can't do SHIT. You have to hope your adc is decent enough to take him down when the game goes past 25-30 minutes. This is the 4th patch he is doing this and there are no changes on the pbe. Riot doesn't have a single top lane player on their balance, so they don't know how unfun it is to play melee top against tahm top. Yhis is even worse than playing against ranged champions, at least you can have them push and call your jungler for a gank, and snowball if you get a lead.

"You forgot about it being 900 range 2 seconds at 40% cdr and a 1.5 second stun on proc." {{champion:268}} (*laughs in reflection*)

Boards 3 months ago: Oh Tahm isn't an issue. Tahm's perfectly heathly and they need to stop nerfing him because he's broken in pro play.

Boards now: Oh god get rid of Tahm oh god oh fuck
He's starting to increase in popularity, so people are starting to play against him more in the top lane
His Q also applies his passive dmg, so he actually deals more dmg.

Try going off meta I might be biased but{{champion:254}} is god top especially against tahm.
start E. harass him from behind minions. 
when lvl 2 get q and aa ee him he should either be forced to back or use a potion if he hadn't used one before
lvl 3 same combo but this time you should kill him due to the w passive.
does depend on runes though i will admit
2 rune trees can work against him
resolve After shock shield bash bone plating and overgrowth
Domination Sudden impact
ravenous hunter offense Flex defense
Some explanations 
Aftershock= Her q procs this not only magic resist and it will do damage
Shield bash=her passive when you hit an enemy with an ability she procs a shield so shield passive she has is even stronger and it does more damage
bone plating defense 
overgrowth not much else

secondary rune tree
Press the attack
triumph
legend of alacrity or bloodline either is fine 
honestly all 3 is really good but i prefer  last stand myself.
Then same domination runes.

{{champion:74}} shits on Tahm pretty hard. Just pop your turrets down and go make a sandwich. {{champion:90}} is also a pretty decent counter to Tahm.

Conventional top laners are gonna dumped on though in Tahm's current state.
Very true
what if you make the slow strength/duration scale with acquired taste stacks
Its damage needs to be lowered all the way to 200 and the slow reduced to like 45%
Rushing {{item:3065}} on {{champion:122}}  is pretty effective against {{champion:223}} just better hope Kench doesn't rush {{item:3076}}

Op : *Points out how a utterly broken champion is unfair because of how much he has in his kit*

Pyke with conq is probably the best matchup against him, ignoring his shield, pretty much more sustain after extended fights and can disengage with E instantly. Until they fix him either ban him or Pyke him
Not for long lel

I had a good camilee game against Kench. I just poked him non stop and he would run at me, but for champs without a sling how do escape his stupid passive. Spent the whole end of the game linked to adcsüôÉ
When you know a tank can have positive winrates against Heimer early game you know it is over the top bullocks

Tahm Kench really isnt broken tho. Your inability to adapt is whats fucking you. NOt every matchup is a " I MUST RUN AT U AND FIGHT U" matchup. some match ups you just farm and scale for late and do teamfights. Tahm Kench is a lane bully and is strongest during the laning phase 1v1 vs melee. He falls off after that. IF you are fighting him during laning phase you arent playing the matchup correctly. If Tahm is broken then so is Pantheon, Kennen, Vlad, Jayce... all these champs need to be nerfed for the same reason-- that reason being that the laning phase you cant do anything to them. He is only performing so well because people are mindlessly walking at him to fight him knowing they wont win in laning phase but doing it anyways and feeding him. Its basically a cheese strat... like what pink ward does with his boxes in top lane. He waits for people to completely disrespect him and die to him even tho, THEY SEE clips online they know he baits people into boxes but they keep repeating the same mistakes and feeding him for no reason. Just dont fight him during the laning phase, shaco invalidates laning phase fighting when played the way pink ward plays him. people will never learn tho.
Vayne and Quinn perform well against him. Otherwise, consider going off meta with something that is comfortable to you.
